description.value:
You release a volley of projectiles from your weapon, or power it to fly in every direction across the battlefield and Strike multiple creatures. Make a Strike with your skysteel multi-tool against each foe within 30 feet of you, or within a @Template[type:cone|distance:60], of your choice. You don't increase your multiple attack penalty until after making all the attacks.

If your skysteel multi-tool is a melee weapon and any of the attacks are outside your reach, you Release the weapon before the Strikes, and it returns to your grasp after all of them. If your hands are full when the weapon returns, it falls to the ground in your space. As normal, if your skysteel multi-tool requires one or more actions to reload between Strikes, you can't use it to make multiple attacks with Full Metal Field.
